field.name: summary
field.value: Castle Windsor : Possible bug with Startable Facility and “decorator pattern” dependencies

field.name: description
field.value:
When attempting to register a startable component that depends on a service whose implementation "decorates" the same service interface, Castle fails to resolve the startable component, claiming that the dependency cannot be resolved. Curiously enough, explicitly resolving the startable component works as expected. I have seen this behavior in both Castle Windsor 2.5 and 2.5.1.
I have cross-posted this, along with a test case demonstrating the problem, on stackoverflow: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3990083/castle-windsor-possible-bug-with-startable-facility-and-decorator-pattern-dep
